activities:
We receive information from purchase and use of the Leap Motion Controller, downloading of applications, and use of our website.  If you use the Leap Motion Controller while connected to the internet we collect device ID, IP address, software version, operating system, hardware configuration, performance data, technical data, and which applications you have used as well as their frequency of use.  All of this information may be associated with your Leap Motion account.  If you use our website we collect usage details, page visits, IP addresses, web browser, and information collected by cookies and other tracking mechanisms. That information may also be associated with your Leap Motion account.
Third party applications may obtain and use other information and customers should check with those third parties' privacy policies for more information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online, offline, and manually processed customer and organization data
